title: Geotechnical Engineering Principles Practical Application Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic civil engineering and geology concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education focused on acquiring geotechnical engineering skills applicable to fieldwork

learning_goals: Solutions for real-world field problems can be proposed through ground behavior analysis using physical models.
The scientific basis of geotechnical engineering principles can be explained and applied to practical tasks through whiteboard animation.
More than three ground stability evaluation methods can be applied through formative assessments after learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
